answers.answer: Uh oh lol b careful I been drinking the coffee bean mocha yum! But be careful I have now very high amniotic fluid. & getting seen twice a week in the hospital...just try not to drink it everyday lol but yeh soooo good so hard to resist I still want one!!!!! Hehe :p
Are you saying the caffine gives you high fluid?? i still drink my one cup of coffee every morning...i've never heard that?!?
I was just thinking the same thing! Most days I stay under the 200mg but now I'm worried!

Idk if this is true but in my experience caffeine makes baby colicy when a baby.I had NO caffeine from 3 weeks till birth my child was never fussy and slept through the night almost instantly.My sister drank it all three times her children were colicy as fussy
I drank A LOT of coffee with my first pregnancy because I didn't know I shouldn't and he slept thru the night at 3 weeks, never fussy. I think in the first 6 months he cried a handful of times.
Lol no no I meant later on I got diagnose with gestational diabetes sorry I should have explain more! Hehe
It was in my blood that's how I found out & told them I drank a lot of mocha & doc said that's y my fluid got high coz it's sweet. Hope this make it clear :)

question: I know its probably a no no but I love Starbucks mocha frappiccino ice cream!!! Do y'all have any guilty pleasures lol
title: guilty pleasures
